thread.title: North Korea leader says forces can 'fight any war' with US - International - World
thread.title_full: North Korea leader says forces can 'fight any war' with US - International - World - Ahram Online

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: North Korea leader says forces can 'fight any war' with US - International - World
text:
Related North Korea starts huge military parade US official warns of 'strong' action over N. Korea rocket launch Odd partnership: Ties warm between India and North Korea North Korea says main nuclear complex operational, warns U.S. North Korea's leader Kim Jong-Un said Saturday his country could fight in any war provoked by the United States, as he presided over a vast parade to mark the 70th anniversary of the ruling Workers' Party.
"Today, our party dauntlessly declares that our revolutionary armed forces are capable of fighting any kind of war provoked by the US and we are ready to protect our people and the blue sky of our motherland," Kim said.
